about_the_game:
WARNING / Developer Warning:
FLOW is not a fully fleshed-out project, and is on Steam for Archival Purposes. With that being said:

This is a SHORT exploration game. Please go into this game expecting to spend your time exploring. This game is an exploration game that explores dark themes. You will need to interpret the text in the game to your own degree. With that being said this game is more of an art than an interactive experience and we hope you enjoy.

Wake up in the shoes of Flo, a 19-year-old, and explore a strange and wonderful world. You can only access this strange world through Flo's nonfunctional computer. The more you explore, the more of the truth behind the world you will find... but be wary: You only have 1 Week to find out what's really going on!

FLOW, at its core, is an exploration psychological horror game. You go behind the scenes of Flo's mind. This gives the game a very bleak and foreboding atmosphere. Explore a mysterious world filled with brightly colored enemies, and discover a forgotten history by navigating through the lively and mundane.



CREDITS:
Dallen Larson / Adam Helquist / jijigri / Lucas Ferreira

content_descriptors.notes: Jumpscares, depictions of alcoholism, and implied suicide. Cartoon violence.

  • OS: MacOS 10.12 (Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 Screen Resolution is recommended.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 Screen Resolution is recommended.

short_description: FLOW is an extremely short psychological horror adventure video game. Wake up in the shoes of Flo, a 19-year-old, and embark on an adventure into a strange and wonderful world. The more you investigate, the more you can learn about the truth behind the universe.
